    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method of the BibCreator.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the input files are not found or there is a problem with one them, then this exception is thrown.
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a problem with either the input files or the output files, then this exception is thrown.

      • checkFileExistence

        public static java.io.File[] checkFileExistence​(java.lang.String authorName)
        Verifies that bibliography files don't already exist for the specified user. If they do, then the offending files will be renamed as BU and older BU files will be deleted.
        Parameters:
        authorName - The name that the user is searching for.
        Returns:
        The bibliography files that will be processed.

      • processBibFiles

        public static boolean processBibFiles​(java.util.Scanner[] inputFiles,
                                      java.io.PrintWriter[] outputFiles)
        The method that will process all files. No IO exceptions should be thrown in this method.
        Parameters:
        inputFiles - All input files in JSON format that need to be processed.
        outputFiles - The 3 bibliography files where the matching references will go.
        Returns:
        The success or failure of processing all the files.

      • includesAuthor

        public static boolean includesAuthor​(java.lang.String authorName,
                                     java.lang.String otherAuthorName)
        Checks if otherAuthorName is the same as the author specified by the user.
        Parameters:
        authorName - The user-specified author name.
        otherAuthorName - The string that is currently being scanned.
        Returns:
        true if the names match, false otherwise.

      • processCompleteAuthorName

        public static void processCompleteAuthorName​(java.lang.String authorReference)
        This method is for adding the author's initials to their last name as well as "et al." at the end. This is for ACM format bibliography.
        Parameters:
        authorReference - The complete list of authors from the reference.
